channel.title: Ghosts. "The paranormal"
channel.description: Do you believe in the paranormal? Have any personal encounters? tell us about it!

item.title: Ghosts. "The paranormal"
item.dc:creator: @Jarrett Jarrett
item.description:
@Jarrett wrote:

I personally dont believe in ghosts or spirits but im still young they could pop out of no wheres.

my little sister says she saw my grandma this was about 6-7 years ago…my sister was ill at the time and had a bad fever so i dont know if she actually saw her or if she was just illusional…still pretty weird if you ask me.

item.title: Ghosts. "The paranormal"
item.dc:creator: @goatee goatee
item.description:
@goatee wrote:

I think “ghosts” are complete crap… made up to scare people or in some cases reasure them.

Ghosts do not exist… yes you get “ghost hunters” but have you ever noticed the history of the “ghost hunters”? Probably not… but if you did look you would see that every single one of them has a perverted interest in little children.

Anyone who REALLY believes in ghosts needs to stay in a graveyard for 3 weeks of their life. Then i can slap there head and say “see, with all these dead bodys around the place you’d think there would be a ghost somewhere wouldnt you? And was theeeeeeeeeeeeere?”

If they answered “No” then i would shake there hand and say “be off with you”

If they answered “Yes” then i would eat them… whole.

Read full topic

item.title: Ghosts. "The paranormal"
item.dc:creator: @Sepranem Sepranem
item.description:
@Sepranem wrote:

First, this is ALL true; I have not made up ANY of the things you will now read.

Ok, when I was 7 or 8, my great-grandma died. Later on, about a year or 2 afterwards, I was living in AK and it was fall time. This is when a lot of the schools like to do their fundraising. My friend’s sister comes knocking on the door, and my mom answers. I was watching from upstairs because I thought it was my other friend coming over. She starts asking my mom if she’d like to buy this makeup, and goes on about how great it is, etc. etc. The whole time I was watching from upstairs. I noticed she kept looking over my mom’s shoulder. Later on, my mom went to their house to visit, and then my friend’s sister asked my mom, “Where’s that old lady that was with you?”…well, my mom says “Mom? Oh, she’s at home.” (that would be my grandma, not the one that died). Then she says “No, no. The other old lady. She used to go around with you guys everywhere for the past year. When I came over to do the fundraising, she was standing behind you with her hand on your shoulder, you didn’t notice? She’s kindof hunched, and is pretty tan. Looks kindof native american.” This was an EXACT description of my great-grandma. She had NEVER been in AK, so there’s no way that my friend’s sister got confused. Remember, this was around 2 years after she died.

I’m not going to say whether I believe in ghosts or not, because I’ve had experiences that prove both sides; however, this was one hell of an occurrence.

Read full topic

No, and I think it’s EXTREMELY foolish to believe in such a thing. I don’t really care who believes in ghosts, if mopar himself believed in ghosts I’d still say he needs professional help, it just seems really absurd to me.

Whoah, anyone else notice it getting cold? Omg it’s an angry ghost!!![br][size=1]Posted at: October 27, 2006, 11:18:58 PM[/size][hr][quote=“killer kure, post:7, topic:20219”]Have you ever noticed that the people who don’t believe in ghosts don’t have ghost in counters?[/quote]

item.title: Ghosts. "The paranormal"
item.dc:creator: @1337h4x 1337h4x
item.description:
@1337h4x wrote:

hell yah.

  1. my grand grandma could heal wounds by just feeling them… blind people would come to her and come out normal.

  2. my mom could predict what would happen the next day, and she would have strange dreams that predicted things into the future. Like once she dreamed of finding a gold coin on the road, and didnt know what it meant, and then boom next day I was born

  3. It was summer, really really hot. I was a kid back then, around 7 years old. All day i wished i could control the wind and stuff. It was kids play, you know. Next day im waving my hands around pretending im a superhero and it starts snowing. No joke.

[quote=“jimmy0s, post:6, topic:20219”][quote author=uncfan1119 link=topic=30674.msg357736#msg357736 date=1162006423]
Yea, i remember seeing a ghost one night, but i passed out, and the next thing you know when i woke up, my butt hurt.
[/quote]
Lmfao…that’s a joke right?[/quote]
you must’ve resserected from the living raped.
